name: movie-assessment
description: Full-stack movie management application with Next.js frontend and NestJS backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && rm -rf .next && npm run build
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:backend"
scripts.start:mixed: npm run build:backend && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run start:backend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.render:build: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf .next && cd ../server && rm -rf dist
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build
